    Restrictions to the road, used together with entryRestrictions in RoutingConnection.
  • uint8 m_infinity
    Current infinity.
  • uint16 m_lineID: 1
    The ID of a busline etc. 0 if this is a street. Not used.

Detailed Description

Contains a node used for routing.
